OUTLINE : Patients stratify accord node status ( positive v negative ) . Patients undergo lymphoscintigraphy , consist technetium Tc 99m human serum albumin colloid inject near tumor . Dynamic image use gamma camera perform 20 minute postinjection static image obtain 3 hour postinjection . Surgery perform within 24 hour lymphoscintigraphy . Patients injected patent blue V dye near tumor gamma detection probe use measure radioactive count sentinel node . Surgery begin within 5 minute patent blue V dye injection . All lymph node stain blue high radioactive count remove . The primary breast lump remove either wide local excision mastectomy axilla clear standard axillary dissection . Some patient may receive patent blue V dye inject pilot study . Sentinel lymph node biopsy axillary dissection proceed . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 150 patient ( 75 per stratum ) accrue main study plus another 50 patient pilot study .
